枝.definition: branch; classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

枝丫.definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]

枝城.definition: Zicheng town in Yidu county 宜都[Yi2 du1], Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

枝城鎮.definition: Zicheng town in Yidu county 宜都[Yi2 du1], Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

枝晶.definition: abbr. of 樹枝狀晶|树枝状晶[shu4 zhi1 zhuang4 jing1]

枝枒.definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]

枝江.definition: Zhijiang, county-level city in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

枝江市.definition: Zhijiang, county-level city in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

枝節.definition: branches and knots; fig. side issue; minor peripheral problem

枝繁葉茂.definition: (of plants) to grow luxuriantly; (fig.) (of a family or business etc) to prosper; to flourish

枝蔓.definition: branches and tendrils; fig. overcomplicated or digressive
